name: Heavy Vertical
description:
This is a Beta release.  It's not complete, only has 10 levels to play with but it is highly playable at this stage.  It *may* have a minor glitch but nothing that stops you from playing it. 

Prologue:  

Mineral resources are getting scarce in your home planet.  To survive, civilization is going out to space to mine.  You are part of one of the largest mining corporations in the galaxy.  Your job is a pilot of a rocket-powered thruster/lifter to do local hauling and transport  in mining areas.  Deliver supplies, ore, equipment,  or perform rescue and ferry missions in high-risk environments on the atmosphere and underground, and land the cargo before running out of power!    

In this galactic mining industry out there in space, who owns what  is a geopolitical matter that nobody follows, let alone knowing the intelligence and the alien species  you are competing against.  It's a constant competition between huge corporations.  Later in the game, hostility and rivalry begin to show up, and your Lifter better be equipped with the right stuff and support to carry out your job in hostile regions!
